name: Blackberry Cream
description: Blackberry Cream from Exotic Genetix combines the sweet berry terpenes of Blackberry Kush with the smooth creamy notes of Cookies and Cream. This 70% indica hybrid produces THC levels up to 25%, above average yields, and is an excellent choice for hash making.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Euphoric, Uplifted, Sleepy, Depression, Stress, Insomnia, Muscle Spasms, Pain, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth
